title.narrative: North and East Local Services Improvement Project

description.narrative: The North East Local Services Improvement Project (NELSIP) is a co-financed initiative with the World Bank (WB)/Government of Sri-Lanka (GoSL). NELSIP will support the reconstruction and development of essential public infrastructure in the conflict-affected Northern and Eastern provinces of Sri Lanka. NELSIP is designed to accelerate economic activity through the delivery of improved local infrastructure services needed to restore and improve the livelihoods and improve local capacity for better public service delivery in these Provinces. NELSIP is targeted at improving access to local services for up to 370,000 people living in some of the poorest areas of the country. Components of the project will also enhance the capacity of Local Government Authorities (LAs) to design, implement and manage new and improved local infrastructure. Infrastructure may include rural roads, bridges, schools, market places, water supply and drainage systems. The total value of this initiative is $25.4 mi
